block.p: Carla A. Hills, who was the United States trade representative throughout the Bush Administration, has announced the formation of her own international business consulting firm, Hills & Company.
Joining Mrs. Hills will be Julius L. Katz, the senior deputy United States trade representative for the last four years, and two top career officials from her former agency.
Carla A. Hills, who was the United States trade representative throughout the Bush Administration, has announced the formation of her own international business consulting firm, Hills & Company.
Joining Mrs. Hills will be Julius L. Katz, the senior deputy United States trade representative for the last four years, and two top career officials from her former agency.

The career officials are Erin Endean, the director of Japan affairs, and Robert Fisher, who was the director of Mexican affairs and who negotiated the tariff reduction provisions of the North American Free Trade Agreement.
